title: Keymaster

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Give a player a key each day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players given a key will be able to lock themselves in their house any night after they have been given a key.
- When a player locks themselves inside of their house, nobody will be able to target them, but they may not perform any of their other night abilities **unless** it is a self-targeting ability.
- Each key may be used only once.
- You may give out five keys in total and yourself one key.

desc:
Post 173
*Sometimes the best protection is just staying in your own little cave of solitude.*
